messages.message: Oracle instant client is now available for ARM :slightly_smiling_face:

Apparently they’ve had support since mid 2021..? https://blogs.oracle.com/opal/post/oracle-instant-client-for-linux-arm-aarch64 (https://blogs.oracle.com/opal/post/oracle-instant-client-for-linux-arm-aarch64)

However: I remember when I joined I was unable to get it to work. I know I tried, b/c I really wanted the Go debugger to work for debugging Oracle issues (Go debugger only works on ARM on M1s). 

It may be that our Go driver still doesn’t work on ARM. If folks are interested, I can investigate again. However, with crafting in the mix, an ARM Oracle driver is probably less important.

Yep found it: https://github.com/godror/godror/issues/155 (https://github.com/godror/godror/issues/155)

I think the problem is actually with the Go driver.
